fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Throw an unlabeled potion at a player during the day.
- Throw a labeled potion at a player during the day. This costs 1 malice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Potions thrown will transform your target into an animal as listed below
- Dog: You will choose their target tonight.
- Bird: Their defense drops by one for tonight.
- Cow: Their attack drops by one for tonight. If they are a part of a rival REF, they are excused from any chats that they may be a part of.
- Rabbit: They are instantly blackmailed.
- Llama: They will be roleblocked tonight. You will gain three malice if they get visited.
- Flea: Their defense and attack drops to none. If they do not get visited, you will put them in a box. Then put that box inside another box, then mail it to yourself. And when it arrives, you will sM**ASH IT WITH A HAMMER!** This is an astral attack. This can only spawn via labeled potions and costs 4 malice instead of 1. You are refunded malice if they get visited. You can only successfully kill someone this way once.
- Both you and your target are notified of which animal they become at night.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value: - Potion throws will backfire, turning you into a cat if your target is jailed. As a cat, you are unable to take the Produce Malice action.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- For the bird and cow potions, their defense drops by two.
- For the rabbit potion, they are no longer able to vote today.
- You now have 3 more charges of the flea potion.
